name: logto
description: Logto is an identity and user management platform tailored for modern apps. It provides authentication, authorization, SSO, and built-in UI components while supporting self-hosting as well as cloud deployments.

features.title: Authentication
features.description: OAuth 2.0, OIDC support, Social login providers. Secure user authentication for modern apps

features.title: User Management
features.description: User profiles, Role-based access, Permission control. Manage identities centrally

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Pre-built login pages, Customizable themes, Mobile-responsive. Ready-to-use authentication UI

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful APIs, SDKs for popular frameworks, Webhook support. Integrate authentication programmatically

features.title: Security
features.description: MFA support, Password policies, Audit logs. Enterprise-grade security features

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Full data control, Privacy-focused, Custom deployment. Own your identity infrastructure
